job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongLooking for a career with a great Company Lighthouse Worldwide Solutions has a great opportunity for you We are seeking a dynamic Software Engineer II embedded web to add to our team LWSstrongppbrppstrongQualified candidates strongmust have an outstanding work ethic be selfmotivated and have a can doget it done teamwork and positive attitude Are you a web developer interested in working in embedded applications The ideal candidate for this role will have software engineering experience with a desire to work with hardware Competitive wages and benefits Great team Great culture and benefitsppbrppstrongEmployer Matchedstrong 401 k Sick and Vacation Health benefits Vision medical dental disability and life insurance ppbrppstrongFounded in 1982strong Lighthouse Worldwide Solutions is the worlds leading supplier of real time contamination monitoring systems and airborne particle counters Lighthouse offers the most complete line of contamination monitoring solutions available that include Airborne Particle Counters Microbial Samplers and Liquid Particle Counters as well as Temperature  Humidity sensors These solutions are now found in semiconductor pharmaceutical data storage biotechnology aerospace and defense industry plants worldwideppAbout the Job This position is responsible for applying knowledge of engineering principles to design develop and tests all aspects of software systems Will use computerassisted engineering design software and equipment to perform assignments Applies principles and techniques of software engineering to accomplish goals May be involved with activities of fabrication operation application installation and repair of software products and systems Relies on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals Works under general supervision and follows instructions and preestablished guidelines as defined by their supervisorppbrppstrongEssential Job Duties and Responsibilities strongpp	Design develop build and test high quality codepp	Expertise and hands on experience with Web Applications and programming languages such as HTML CSS JavaScript and APIspp	Expertise in C and NET developmentpp	Develop design tools to support product development effortspp	Collaborate with multidiscipline engineering teams to design and develop new productspp	Uses engineering methodology and procedures to apply principles to design and development project per company SOPpp	The above listing represents the general duties considered essential functions of the job and is not to be considered a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be inherent in the positionpp	Other general duties as assignedppbrppstrongMinimum Requirements Skills and Qualificationsstrongpp	BS in Engineering or Computer Science and 4 years of experience in a related field or equivalentpp	Strong knowledge of JavascriptTypescript HTML CSSpp	Strong knowledge of Windows application developmentpp	Experience using version control tools such as Gitpp	Ability to read understand and modify system diagramspp	Must have a great can do attitudepp	Outstanding problemsolving resolution and attention to detail willing to lead by examplepp	Strong verbal and written communication skillspp	Outstanding work ethic organizational and multitasking skillspp	Takes initiative and works well independentlyppstrongPreferred Skills and Qualificationsstrongpp	Embedded application experiencepp	Experience working with firmware teams to develop communication protocolspp	Web development andor web development in embedded systemsppbrppbrppEEO Statement Lighthouse Worldwide Solutions is an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to race age color sex religion national origin marital status ancestry citizenship veteran status sexual orientation or preference or disability statusppbrppCANDIDATES SUBJECT TO PREEMPLOYMENT BACKGROUND SCREENING Email resume and cover letter to humanresourcesgolighthhousecomp
